visual.name: kpicard
visual.description: A single KPI card with value, currency support, target variance, and sparkline

dataRoles.name: trend
dataRoles.description: Values for the sparkline (e.g. monthly figures)

dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: Category axis for the sparkline (e.g. months)
